title: Ocean Week Community Wall Idea ?
body: With the success of Ocean Week and all the people who got over 10 points, I think it would be pretty cool if a massive art work of some kind or League Logo was made using the summoner names.

replies.body:
That's a cool idea!
This year though we decided to partner with our passionate community to create a piece of art.
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/contests/ocean-week-community-contests-are-here

> The grand prize winner will team up with a professional street artist to create the Ocean Week community wall at a cool location!

> [{quoted}](name=MasterMirkinen,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bdiWO7rp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-02T02:11:13.743+0000)
>
> That's a cool idea!
> This year though we decided to partner with our passionate community to create a piece of art.
> http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/contests/ocean-week-community-contests-are-here

That's pretty cool. Thank's for the reply
